FuncDef:
The adaptive-routing enable dragonfly-role command enables the adaptive routing function on an interface and configures the role of the interface on a direct network.
The undo adaptive-routing enable dragonfly-role command disables the adaptive routing function on an interface and cancels the role configuration of the interface on a direct network. The adaptive-routing enable dragonfly-role command enables the adaptive routing function on an interface and configures the role of the interface on a direct network. The undo adaptive-routing enable dragonfly-role command disables the adaptive routing function on an interface and cancels the role configuration of the interface on a direct network. By default, the adaptive routing function is disabled on an interface, and no role is configured for the interface on a direct network. This command is supported only on the CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
CLIs: undo adaptive-routing enable dragonfly-role { global | local }
ParentView: 100GE interface view,200GE interface view,400GE interface view,Interface group view
ExtraInfo: After a role is configured for an interface on a direct network, when congestion occurs on the direct network, the interface performs corresponding operations based on the role to quickly adjust network paths and prevent services from being blocked.
